channel.title: Runescape is crashing
channel.description: Alot of people are quiting and stuff like that, what are they doing? Look at these BAD updates... Summoning was a big disappointment, there is NO point in the summoning creatures besides the ones who help A LITTLE in the skills. No pking?? Wow... thats the point of runescape for me... I didnt play runescape to own monsters. or get rich and walk around. Or do skills/meet people/get 99s. I wanted to get good and kill everyone. W/e if they want to ruin their game by taking away pking because of gold traders go ahead. Then they cover the no pking with CRAPPY updates. Thanks, bye.

item.title: Runescape is crashing
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:26, topic:186949”]The real reason as to why these update took place was because of the change in leadership. The new CEO is from Euro Paypal. He cares about one thing. Profit. And because of him, they had to get rid of Autoers. But, to get rid of them, they had to go through all of these ridiculous steps to accomplish that. So if you want to direct your anger, don’t direct it at Jagex, direct it at Geof Iddison.

“On October 23, 2007, Geoff Iddison, former European CEO of PayPal, replaced Constant Tedder as CEO in order to “accelerate international growth”. Since Geoff Iddison was appointed, Jagex has appeared in the press far more frequently than it had under Tedder.”[/quote]

Wow, can you link me to the article where you found that?

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape is crashing
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

[quote=“shpoanator, post:24, topic:186949”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=249484.msg2107900#msg2107900 date=1205481686]
Both the same thing, boring grinding games. GunZ > both.
[/quote]

Gunz fucking owns I love that game! Most of the games on ijji are awsome

I don’t think WOW is that bad of a game. It definitely beats Runescape. (not only grading on graphics)[/quote]
haven’t gotten GunZ yet.

WoW beats runescape in Graphics. But I think that runescape is a better and ‘safer’ choice. WoW makes you like play hours and hours straight (so does runescape) but… WoW is just more… like. Theres so many more things to do that makes you wanna play so much. In runescape, you start to get bored and you take a break after a couple of hours.

Originally, I was a pker. I made plenty of pures to fight in non members and members alike. But, without it I’m just fine.

Me too, i have like 7 pures with good skills. I might go back on one of my pures and skill up his fishing to start making some money and bring him back up.
Without pking it’s gotten boring, so i need to get p2p soon

item.title: Runescape is crashing
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I find it funny that most of them quit, they quit over alot of updates which personally made Runescape better.

No more dueling, so people can’t go from 10m to 2bil in a day, and then end up selling it for RL Cash…

No more pking, which was a good update by jagex imo, they just need to make you lose all items once you’ve died in clan wars

Grand Exchange, It’s great, no more rushing to w2, and lagging out after 5minutes, and you can get everything you need in seconds.

Also when those 150-200k people quit, it made it easier for skillers to train, not that many more crowded areas, but they still are a bit crowded.

Read full topic
